articles.author: By Francesca Chambers, White House Correspondent For Dailymail.com
articles.title: Kim Kardashian to make pardon plea for Alice Johnson at White House
articles.description: Kim Kardashian is meeting with Donald Trump at the White House to discuss a pardon for a first-time drug offender. She said in a tweet: 'Happy Birthday Alice Marie Johnson. Today is for you'

articles.author: By Sebastian Murphy-bates For Mailonline
articles.title: London suburb on lockdown as police hunt 'gunman' near Islamic school
articles.description: Police have been pictured hunting for a gunman near Darul Uloom school in Chislehurst, south-east London.

articles.author: By Chris Greenwood for the Daily Mail, Zoie O'brien For Mailonline and Sebastian Murphy-bates For Mailonline
articles.title: Singer, 22, has fallen to her death from luxury London apartment block
articles.description: An aspiring singer has died after falling from the Heron building in London, sparking a police murder probe. Bethany-Maria Beales was described as a 'shining star' by her family.

articles.author: By Sebastian Murphy-bates For Mailonline, Martin Robinson and Tom Payne For The Daily Mail
articles.title: Estranged husband charged with murder of wedding planner and daughter
articles.description: Christopher Boon, 28, has been charged with the murder of Laura Boon, 31, nee Mortimer, and her daughter Ella Dalby, 11, after they were found dead at a house in Gloucester.

articles.author: By Georgia Edkins For The Daily Mail
articles.title: Meghan Markle and Amal Clooney among UK's 25 most influential women
articles.description: Vogue's list, known as Vogue 25, features the likes of the Duchess of Sussex, human rights lawyer Amal Clooney, Scottish Tory leader Ruth Davidson and pop star Dua Lipa, 22.

articles.author: By Lara Keay For Mailonline
articles.title: Shrine outside George Michael's London home FINALLY cleared
articles.description: Since George Michael died at home in Oxfordshire in 2016, fans have travelled there and to his other house in Highgate to pay their respects with flowers, candles and photographs.

articles.author: By Chris Greenwood and Inderdeep Bains for the Daily Mail
articles.title: Oil baron Ely Calil dies in a 'freak accident' at his London mansion
articles.description: Ely Calil, 72, was found after apparently falling down the stairs of the multi-million pound property in Holland Park, West London. A close friend said the tycoon 'broke his neck'.

articles.author: By Faye White For The Daily Mail
articles.title: New mum Serena Williams opens up on finally accepting her figure
articles.description: New mother Serena Williams has opened up about finally accepting her curvy and strong figure and how she is proud that her daughter will look like her.

articles.author: By Sebastian Murphy-bates For Mailonline
articles.title: Sausage dog blew up to THREE TIMES its size after windpipe punctured
articles.description: Fran Jennings from Lymm, Cheshire, came downstairs one morning to find her dachshund was inflating with every breath as air escaped through his punctured windpipe and out under his skin.

articles.author: By John Stevens  Deputy Political Editor For The Daily Mail
articles.title: Stop harassing me with emails, Tory MP tells Brexiteers
articles.description: Tory rebel Antoinette Sandbach threatened Brexit supporters that she would report them for harassment after they emailed to complain about how she had repeatedly defied the Prime Minister.
